name: tentree Benson Flannel Shirt - Men's
description:
From fireside to mountainside, this cozy flannel shirt blends organic cotton and hemp, so it breathes while keeping you warm. Hemp is naturally antimicrobial and UV resistant, as well as incredibly durable, meaning this one will stay at the top of your rotation for a long time to come.Made from durable, breathable organic cotton and hemp.Regular fit.
